text: Zhou MeiyuAlso Chou Mei-yü or Chow Mei-yu. The name is 周美玉 in Chinese. (1910-2001) was a Chinese nurse, "among the most influential Chinese nurses of the early twentieth century". She was the first woman in the Republic of China to attain the rank of General. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:2001 deaths Category:Chinese nurses
title: Zhou Meiyu
